description.value:
This stone fragment from the Third Seal retains a tiny sliver of that legendary item's power. The shard sheds light constantly, with the effects of a torch requiring no oxygen and generating no heat. The flame can be covered or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden}, but it can't be smothered or quenched.

Activate2 envision, Interact

Effect You generate the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Disrupt Undead]{Disrupt Undead} cantrip, heightened to 3rd level.

Activate2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect By passing the shard over a creature or object, you can produce the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Nondetection]{Nondetection} spell on that target.

Activate2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect By gripping the shard tightly and waving it before you, you can produce the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Levitate]{Levitate} spell on yourself.

source.value: Pathfinder Adventure: Crown of the Kobold King
